original_text:
Cry out and wail, son of man,
    for it is against my people;
    it is against all the princes of Israel.
They are thrown to the sword
    along with my people.
Therefore beat your breast.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 부르짖어 슬피 울지어다 이것이 내 백성에게 임하며 이스라엘 모든 고관에게 임함이로다 그들과 내 백성이 함께 칼에 넘긴 바 되었으니 너는 네 넓적다리를 칠지어다

sentences.original_text: Cry out and wail, son of man,
for it is against my people;
it is against all the princes of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 이스라엘의 모든 지도자들을 치기 위함이라.

sentences.original_text: They are thrown to the sword
